title: _ALLOW_PAUSE_MENU_WHEN_DEAD_THIS_FRAME
content:
0xCC3FDDED67BCFC630x630CD8EE// AllowPauseMenuWhenDeadThisFrame
void _ALLOW_PAUSE_MENU_WHEN_DEAD_THIS_FRAME();Allows opening the pause menu this frame, when the player is dead.Examples:LuaCitizen.CreateThread(function()
	while true do
		N_0xcc3fdded67bcfc63()
		Wait(0)
	end
end)
codeBlocks:
Citizen.CreateThread(function()
	while true do
		N_0xcc3fdded67bcfc63()
		Wait(0)
	end
end)
